sentences.en: Graduation was held in the gym because of rain.
sentences.cn: 由于天气下雨,毕业典礼是在体育馆举行的.

sentences.en: I did a two - hour workout in the gym.
sentences.cn: 我在健身房锻炼了两个小时.

sentences.en: I go to the gym as often as I can.
sentences.cn: 我一有空就去健身房健身。

sentences.en: I was in the gym lifting weights.
If you enrol at a gym that's miles away, you won't be visiting it as often as you should.
sentences.cn: 如果你加入的健身馆非常远，就不会去得那么经常了。

sentences.en: It's going to be in the gym at three o'clock.
She went to the gym with her trainer.
sentences.cn: 她和她的教练一起去了健身房。

sentences.en: The gym can be used by both able-bodied and disabled people.
sentences.cn: 这家健身房健全和残障人士都可使用。

sentences.en: The gym teacher said we should walk at a smart pace.
sentences.cn: 体操教师说,我们应该用轻快的步伐走.

sentences.en: The gym teachers lined us up against the cement walls.
sentences.cn: 体育老师让我们靠着水泥墙排好。

sentences.en: These athletes work out at the gym for two hours every day.
sentences.cn: 这些运动员每天都要在体育馆锻炼两个小时.

sentences.en: to play basketball in the gym
We played basketball in the gym.
sentences.cn: 我们在体育馆里打篮球.

sentences.en: While the lads are golfing, I work out in the gym.
sentences.cn: 小伙子们打高尔夫球的时候，我在健身房锻炼。

sentences.en: Work out at a gym or swim twice a week.
sentences.cn: 一周去健身房锻炼两次，或游两次泳。

trans.tran_cn: <非正>健身房，体育馆，室内健身操，体操
trans.tran_en: a special building or room that has equipment for doing physical exercise
a special building or room that has equipment for doing physical exercise
